title: E-commerce Platform Redesign
description: Complete redesign and development of a modern e-commerce platform using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Implemented advanced features including real-time inventory management, AI-powered recommendations, and seamless payment processing.

title: Engineering Team Scaling Initiative
description: Led a strategic initiative to scale an engineering team from 15 to 45 developers across 3 product areas. Implemented new hiring processes, mentorship programs, and technical architecture decisions that improved delivery velocity by 300%.

title: Progressive Web App for Healthcare
description: Developed a PWA for healthcare providers to manage patient appointments and records. Built with offline-first approach using service workers, implemented HIPAA compliance, and integrated with existing hospital systems.

title: DevOps Culture Transformation
description: Guided a traditional software company through DevOps adoption, implementing CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and infrastructure as code. Reduced deployment time from 2 weeks to 2 hours and improved system reliability by 99.9%.

title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
description: Built a comprehensive analytics dashboard for a SaaS platform using React, D3.js, and WebSocket connections. Features real-time data visualization, custom reporting, and interactive filters for business intelligence.
